name: Robotomeow
description:
Controls: WASD for movement, and Space bar for jump.  Escape for pause.

Robotomeow is a platformer featuring Alien robotic cats forcing humans to run through their obstacle course like a mouse.  They use mouse imagery to mock us.  If you win you will be a good pet, if you fail you will be forced to fall back down to the earth.

Uses the Ue4 included 3rd person character, and some bsp.
